qas.question: What is a main practical difficulty in determining n?

answers.text: the two most accurate methods, the watt balance and the X-ray crystal density method, do not appear to agree with one another
it is (or they are) not as precise as is currently believed

qas.question: Which method is at fault or the discrepancy?

answers.text: there is no indication which method is at fault

plausible_answers.text: the two most accurate methods, the watt balance and the X-ray crystal density method, do not appear to agree with one another
